mapper.select: select wt_number, TO_CHAR(wt_start_time,'HH24:MI') as wt_start_time, TO_CHAR(wt_end_time,'HH24:MI') as wt_end_time, wt_name as wt_name, wt_day, wt_redday from work_time order by wt_number
mapper.update: insert into diligence_and_laziness(dal_number, dal_date, dal_attend_time, dal_off_time, dal_mem_number) values ('dal'||dal_seq.nextval,#{dal_date},#{dal_attend_time},#{dal_off_time},#{dal_mem_number})

update company set company_name=#{company_name}, company_tel=#{company_tel}, company_zip=#{company_zip}, company_addr1=#{company_addr1}, company_addr2=#{company_addr2} where company_number = #{company_number}
mapper.select: select dept_number, dept_name, dept_membernumber, dept_tel, dept_level, dept_addr, dept_parents, mem_number, mem_name, mem_position_number, position_number, position_name from dept_view order by dept_level, dept_name
select mem_number, mem_name, mem_position_number, position_number, position_name, position_level from dept_view where position_level < 400 order by position_number, mem_number
mapper.update: insert into department (dept_number, dept_name, dept_membernumber, dept_tel, dept_level, dept_addr, dept_parents) values ('dept'||dept_seq.nextval, #{dept_name},#{dept_membernumber},#{dept_tel},#{dept_level},#{dept_addr},#{dept_parents})
mapper.select: select dept_level from department where dept_number=#{dept_number}
select to_number(substr(position_number,9)), position_number, position_name, position_level from position order by position_level, to_number(substr(position_number,9))
mapper.update: insert into position (position_number, position_name, position_level) values ('position'||position_seq.nextval, #{position_name},#{position_level})
mapper.select: select * from pay_policy_view order by pk_number, position_level
select * from pay_policy_view where pk_number = 'pk1' order by pk_number, position_level
select * from pay_policy_view where pk_number = 'pk2' order by pk_number, position_level
select * from pay_policy_view where pk_number = 'pk3' order by pk_number, position_level
mapper.update: insert into pay_kind(pk_number, pk_name, pk_tax) values ('pk'||pk_seq.nextval, #{pk_name}, #{pk_tax})
